name: Nabalus serpentaria
details: Prenanthes Serpentaria - Rattlesnake root - White Lettuce, similar to Lactuca, chronic diarrhoea, worse after eating, nights and towards morning. Pain in abdomen and rectum; emaciation. Constipation and somnolence; susceptible to aura of others. Dyspepsia, with acid burning eructation. CRAVING FOR ACID FOOD. Leucorrhoea with throbbing in uterus.
